holdyourbreath.midnightconfig.title: Hold Your Breath Config
holdyourbreath.midnightconfig.serverSect:
Unless you are in singleplayer or the host of a LAN world, changing these options here will have no effect, except maybe causing the air bar to desync.
Use the server config instead. It's still best to keep this synced with the client to prevent the air bar from desyncing.
holdyourbreath.midnightconfig.breathHold: If "Breath holding enabled" is turned off, holding the "Hold breath" key won't prevent drowning.
holdyourbreath.midnightconfig.safeTicksA: Number of safe ticks after login or respawn
holdyourbreath.midnightconfig.allowRecov: If false (default), once a player releases the breathing key underwater, they will continue to drown even if they re-press it.
holdyourbreath.midnightconfig.clientSect: These options are client-side only and can be set separately for each player. They will not have an effect if set on the server.
holdyourbreath.midnightconfig.toggleBrea:
If "Toggle breathing" is enabled, then instead of holding down the "Hold breath" key, it will toggle whether or not you are breathing.
Please ask your server admin before using this option.
